20101228030148.000|20101228030149.000|CC1|BEFORE THE BUS GETS HERE.       
20101228030149.000|20101228030150.000|CC1|>> THE BUS MEANING?

20101228030151.000|20101228030154.000|CC1|TO THE FACILITY.                
20101228030154.000|20101228030156.000|CC1|ONCE THEY GET HERE, ALL THE     
20101228030156.000|20101228030202.000|CC1|EXCITEMENT STARTS.              
20101228030202.000|20101228030205.000|CC1|>> EVERY WEEK, DOZENS OF NEW    
20101228030205.000|20101228030207.000|CC1|INMATES ARRIVE AT LIMON         
20101228030207.000|20101228030208.000|CC1|CORRECTIONAL FACILITY.          
20101228030208.000|20101228030212.000|CC1|A LEVEL FOUR PRISON LOCATED ON  
20101228030212.000|20101228030213.000|CC1|THE BARREN PLAINS OF EASTERN    
20101228030213.000|20101228030217.000|CC1|COLORADO.                       
20101228030217.000|20101228030221.000|CC1|THE PRISON SITS ON 320 ACRES AND
20101228030221.000|20101228030224.000|CC1|HOUSES INMATES THE IN SIX       
20101228030224.000|20101228030225.000|CC1|DIFFERENT LIVING UNITS.         
20101228030225.000|20101228030226.000|CC1|>> THE TYPE OF OFFENDERS WE HAVE
20101228030226.000|20101228030228.000|CC1|AT LIMON ARE VIOLENT OFFENDERS. 
20101228030228.000|20101228030230.000|CC1|WE HAVE 64% VIOLENT.            
20101228030230.000|20101228030231.000|CC1|244 OF OUR OFFENDERS ARE SERVING
20101228030231.000|20101228030243.000|CC1|A LIFE SENTENCE.                
20101228030243.000|20101228030244.000|CC1|LIMON HAS HAD A REPUTATION OF   
20101228030244.000|20101228030246.000|CC1|BEING A VIOLENT PRISON AMONGST  
20101228030246.000|20101228030248.000|CC1|THE OFFENDER POPULATION.        
20101228030248.000|20101228030249.000|CC1|THEY DO TEND TO SEND A MAJORITY 
20101228030249.000|20101228030254.000|CC1|OF VIOLENT OFFENDERS TO LIMON.  
20101228030254.000|20101228030256.000|CC1|>> OH, MY GOD.                  
20101228030256.000|20101228030257.000|CC1|LAST TIME I WAS ON TV, THEY WERE
20101228030257.000|20101228030300.000|CC1|CHASING ME.                     
20101228030300.000|20101228030310.000|CC1|>> ARMS UP.                     
20101228030310.000|20101228030312.000|CC1|>> AS A LEVEL FOUR FACILITY,    
20101228030312.000|20101228030314.000|CC1|LIMON HOUSES MANY OF COLORADO'S 
20101228030314.000|20101228030315.000|CC1|MOST DANGEROUS INMATES.         
20101228030315.000|20101228030317.000|CC1|WHILE SOME OF TODAY'S ARRIVALS  
20101228030317.000|20101228030319.000|CC1|ARE NEW TO PRISON, OTHERS HAVE  
20101228030319.000|20101228030319.000|CC1|BEEN THROUGH THE PROCESS        
20101228030319.000|20101228030322.000|CC1|NUMEROUS TIMES BEFORE.          
20101228030322.000|20101228030324.000|CC1|ONE IN PARTICULAR COMES WITH A  
20101228030324.000|20101228030325.000|CC1|REPUTATION THAT PRECEDES HIM.   
20101228030325.000|20101228030328.000|CC1|>> WE HAVE ONE COMING OFF THE   
20101228030328.000|20101228030330.000|CC1|BUS GOING STRAIGHT TO           
20101228030330.000|20101228030331.000|CC1|SEGREGATION.                    
20101228030331.000|20101228030338.000|CC1|THAT WOULD BE INMATE TIMOTHY    
20101228030338.000|20101228030338.000|CC1|SCHREIBER.                      
20101228030338.000|20101228030339.000|CC1|>> HE HAS TRANSFERRED HERE FROM 
20101228030339.000|20101228030341.000|CC1|ANOTHER STATE PRISON.           
20101228030341.000|20101228030342.000|CC1|UNLIKE MOST NEW ARRIVALS, HE IS 
20101228030342.000|20101228030344.000|CC1|SENT IMMEDIATELY TO             
20101228030344.000|20101228030345.000|CC1|ADMINISTRATIVE SEGREGATION.     
20101228030345.000|20101228030347.000|CC1|A 23-HOUR-A-DAY LOCKUP UNIT FOR 
20101228030347.000|20101228030351.000|CC1|DISRUPTIVE INMATES.             
20101228030351.000|20101228030352.000|CC1|>> I GOT THE ROOM WITH A VIEW,  
20101228030352.000|20101228030353.000|CC1|HUH?                            
20101228030353.000|20101228030354.000|CC1|>> AT THE FACILITY THAT HE WAS  
20101228030354.000|20101228030356.000|CC1|HOUSED AT JUST COMING TO LIMON, 
20101228030356.000|20101228030358.000|CC1|HE WAS FOUND WITH A WEAPON, A   
20101228030358.000|20101228030400.000|CC1|HOMEMADE KNIFE, SO HE DID HAVE  
20101228030400.000|20101228030401.000|CC1|SOME CHARGES THAT WERE PENDING. 
20101228030401.000|20101228030402.000|CC1|AS A RESULT, HE JUST WENT       
20101228030402.000|20101228030404.000|CC1|STRAIGHT INTO OUR SEGREGATION   
20101228030404.000|20101228030405.000|CC1|UNIT.

20101228030407.000|20101228030408.000|CC1|I'LL BE HERE.                   
20101228030408.000|20101228030411.000|CC1|>> WE SOON LEARNED THAT         
20101228030411.000|20101228030412.000|CC1|SCHREIBER DID IN FACT LIKE TO   
20101228030412.000|20101228030413.000|CC1|TALK.

20101228030418.000|20101228030420.000|CC1|CORRECTIONAL STAFF, HELPING US  
20101228030420.000|20101228030421.000|CC1|SET UP FOR THE INTERVIEW.

20101228030423.000|20101228030424.000|CC1|KEY IN THERE AND TURN IT, IT'S

20101228030434.000|20101228030435.000|CC1|RIGHT NOW.                      
20101228030435.000|20101228030436.000|CC1|>> I'M SORRY.                   
20101228030436.000|20101228030437.000|CC1|I DIDN'T MEAN TO STEAL YOUR 15  
20101228030437.000|20101228030438.000|CC1|SECONDS OF FAME.                
20101228030438.000|20101228030439.000|CC1|>> WHEN HE FINISHED VERBALLY    
20101228030439.000|20101228030441.000|CC1|SPARRING WITH THE CORRECTIONAL  
20101228030441.000|20101228030443.000|CC1|STAFF, HE EXPLAINED WHAT BROUGHT
20101228030443.000|20101228030444.000|CC1|HIM TO PRISON.                  
20101228030444.000|20101228030446.000|CC1|>> MY ORIGINAL SEX CRIME WAS AN 
20101228030446.000|20101228030448.000|CC1|ATTEMPTED SEXUAL ASSAULT ON A   
20101228030448.000|20101228030456.000|CC1|13-YEAR-OLD GIRL.               
20101228030456.000|20101228030500.000|CC1|I HAVE A HISTORY OF REPEATED    
20101228030500.000|20101228030500.000|CC1|FLASHINGS.                      
20101228030500.000|20101228030502.000|CC1|I'M LIKE A SERIAL FLASHER.      
20101228030502.000|20101228030505.000|CC1|THIS IS MY SIXTH CONVICTION.    
20101228030505.000|20101228030506.000|CC1|I'VE NEVER FLASHED ANYONE       
20101228030506.000|20101228030511.000|CC1|YOUNGER THAN 13, BUT I HAVE -- I
20101228030511.000|20101228030513.000|CC1|LIKE 13 TO 18, SOMEWHERE IN THE 
20101228030513.000|20101228030514.000|CC1|DANGER ZONE FOR ME.             
20101228030514.000|20101228030516.000|CC1|I CALL IT THE DANGER ZONE WHERE 
20101228030516.000|20101228030521.000|CC1|IT'S VERY, VERY RISKY.          
20101228030521.000|20101228030522.000|CC1|THERE'S MY NEIGHBORS GOING OFF  
20101228030522.000|20101228030523.000|CC1|RIGHT NOW.                      
20101228030523.000|20101228030525.000|CC1|THEY KNOW ABOUT ME.             
20101228030525.000|20101228030528.000|CC1|THAT'S WHY THEY'RE MAKING NOISE.
20101228030528.000|20101228030530.000|CC1|>> THROUGHOUT AD SEG AND OTHER  
20101228030530.000|20101228030532.000|CC1|CELL BLOCKS, VOICES ECHO AND CAN
20101228030532.000|20101228030533.000|CC1|BE HEARD BY OTHER INMATES.      
20101228030533.000|20101228030535.000|CC1|THAT'S WHY MOST SEX OFFENDERS   
20101228030535.000|20101228030537.000|CC1|DON'T SPEAK OPENLY ABOUT THEIR  
20101228030537.000|20101228030537.000|CC1|CRIMES.                         
20101228030537.000|20101228030539.000|CC1|>> AS FAR AS I'M CONCERNED, A   
20101228030539.000|20101228030542.000|CC1|MAN LIKE THAT, IN MY EYES, IT IS
20101228030542.000|20101228030545.000|CC1|MY DUTY AS A MAN TO PUT THE FEAR
20101228030545.000|20101228030555.000|CC1|OF GOD INTO THIS MAN.           
20101228030555.000|20101228030556.000|CC1|I WANT HIM WHEN HE GOES BACK OUT
20101228030556.000|20101228030558.000|CC1|ON THE STREETS, WHEN HE SEES    
20101228030558.000|20101228030600.000|CC1|MAYBE YOUR CHILD WALKING DOWN   
20101228030600.000|20101228030603.000|CC1|THE STREET OR MY KIDS PLAYING IN
20101228030603.000|20101228030604.000|CC1|THE PARK, I WANT HIM TO BE      
20101228030604.000|20101228030606.000|CC1|TERRIFIED AT THE THOUGHT OF     
20101228030606.000|20101228030607.000|CC1|COMING BACK TO PRISON.          
20101228030607.000|20101228030609.000|CC1|HE IS NOT GETTING ANY WORSE OF  
20101228030609.000|20101228030611.000|CC1|TREATMENT THAN THE 13-YEAR-OLD  
20101228030611.000|20101228030613.000|CC1|GIRL THAT HE WAS BRAGGING ABOUT 
20101228030613.000|20101228030615.000|CC1|SEXUALLY ASSAULTING ON THE      
20101228030615.000|20101228030616.000|CC1|STREETS, BASICALLY PROBABLY     
20101228030616.000|20101228030618.000|CC1|RUINED THAT GIRL'S LIFE.        
20101228030618.000|20101228030621.000|CC1|>> SHE WAS ONLY 13!             
20101228030621.000|20101228030623.000|CC1|>> YOU DON'T WANT TO BE A SEX   
20101228030623.000|20101228030624.000|CC1|OFFENDER IN PRISON.             
20101228030624.000|20101228030625.000|CC1|IT'S HELL.                      
20101228030625.000|20101228030627.000|CC1|[ BLEEP ].                      
20101228030627.000|20101228030630.000|CC1|>> THOUGH MOST INMATES STRIVE TO
20101228030630.000|20101228030633.000|CC1|STAY OUT OF AD SEG, A PLACE     
20101228030633.000|20101228030634.000|CC1|WHERE THE FEW PRIVILEGES THEY'RE
20101228030634.000|20101228030635.000|CC1|ALLOWED TO HAVE IN PRISON ARE   
20101228030635.000|20101228030638.000|CC1|TAKEN AWAY, SCHREIBER KNOWS IT'S
20101228030638.000|20101228030640.000|CC1|PROBABLY THE SAFEST PLACE FOR   
20101228030640.000|20101228030641.000|CC1|SOMEONE LIKE HIMSELF.           
20101228030641.000|20101228030644.000|CC1|>> THEY AREN'T GOING TO PUT UP  
20101228030644.000|20101228030644.000|CC1|WITH MY [ BLEEP ] PRESENCE.     
20101228030644.000|20101228030645.000|CC1|THEY'RE NOT.                    
20101228030645.000|20101228030647.000|CC1|>> BUT HIS STAY HERE IS ONLY    
20101228030647.000|20101228030648.000|CC1|TEMPORARY.                      
20101228030648.000|20101228030649.000|CC1|THE PRISON HE TRANSFERRED FROM  
20101228030649.000|20101228030650.000|CC1|HAS DECIDED NOT TO CHARGE HIM   
20101228030650.000|20101228030652.000|CC1|FOR HAVING A SHANK.             
20101228030652.000|20101228030654.000|CC1|SO HE WILL SOON BE RETURNED TO  
20101228030654.000|20101228030657.000|CC1|GENERAL POPULATION.             
20101228030657.000|20101228030659.000|CC1|>> INTEL OFFICER FROM THE       
20101228030659.000|20101228030700.000|CC1|FACILITY THAT HE WAS SENT HERE  
20101228030700.000|20101228030703.000|CC1|FROM E-MAILED ME AND SAID THEY  
20101228030703.000|20101228030705.000|CC1|WEREN'T GOING TO PURSUE AN AD   
20101228030705.000|20101228030707.000|CC1|SEG OVER IT SO WE DECIDED HE    
20101228030707.000|20101228030708.000|CC1|COULD GO INTO GENERAL           
20101228030708.000|20101228030708.000|CC1|POPULATION.                     
20101228030708.000|20101228030710.000|CC1|WE HAD NO REASON TO AD SEG HIM  
20101228030710.000|20101228030711.000|CC1|FROM HIM.                       
20101228030711.000|20101228030713.000|CC1|>> MANY SEGREGATE SEX OFFENDERS 
20101228030713.000|20101228030714.000|CC1|FOR THEIR OWN PROTECTION, BUT   
20101228030714.000|20101228030716.000|CC1|NOT IN COLORADO.                
20101228030716.000|20101228030719.000|CC1|INSTEAD, INMATES WHO ATTACK SEX 
20101228030719.000|20101228030720.000|CC1|OFFENDERS ARE TRANSFERRED TO    
20101228030720.000|20101228030721.000|CC1|ANOTHER STATE PRISON.           
20101228030721.000|20101228030724.000|CC1|>> WE ARE ADAMANT THAT WE WILL  
20101228030724.000|20101228030725.000|CC1|NOT SEGREGATE THE SEX OFFENDERS 
20101228030725.000|20101228030727.000|CC1|HERE AND INTEGRATE THEM WITH THE
20101228030727.000|20101228030728.000|CC1|REST OF THE POPULATION.         
20101228030728.000|20101228030729.000|CC1|WE DO THAT TO MANAGE THE        
20101228030729.000|20101228030731.000|CC1|POPULATION AND NOT CLOSE DOORS  
20101228030731.000|20101228030734.000|CC1|IN REGARDS TO WHERE WE CAN HOUSE
20101228030734.000|20101228030734.000|CC1|THEM.                           
20101228030734.000|20101228030735.000|CC1|IT DOES CREATE PROBLEMS BECAUSE 
20101228030735.000|20101228030737.000|CC1|THE GENERAL POPULATION TRY TO   
20101228030737.000|20101228030738.000|CC1|ASSAULT THE SEX OFFENDERS       
20101228030738.000|20101228030739.000|CC1|BECAUSE THEY DON'T WANT THEM    
20101228030739.000|20101228030740.000|CC1|HOUSED AROUND THEM.             
20101228030740.000|20101228030741.000|CC1|>> THEY'RE GOING TO PUT HIM     
20101228030741.000|20101228030746.000|CC1|AROUND ME ON THE ARC, HE'S GOING
20101228030746.000|20101228030749.000|CC1|TO GET SMASHED, SIMPLE AS THAT. 
20101228030749.000|20101228030752.000|CC1|>> MICHAEL GILL IS ONE OF THE   
20101228030752.000|20101228030756.000|CC1|INMATES YELLING AT SCHREIBER    
20101228030756.000|20101228030757.000|CC1|DURING HIS INTERVIEW.           
20101228030757.000|20101228030759.000|CC1|GILL HAS ALREADY SERVED TWO     
20101228030759.000|20101228030800.000|CC1|YEARS FOR SEXUAL ASSAULT AND IS 
20101228030800.000|20101228030803.000|CC1|NOW BACK ON A PAROLE VIOLATION  
20101228030803.000|20101228030805.000|CC1|BUT HE'S WON ALLIES BY CARRYING 
20101228030805.000|20101228030807.000|CC1|OUT OTHER CRIMES IN PRISON,     
20101228030807.000|20101228030809.000|CC1|INCLUDING SOME AGAINST SEX      
20101228030809.000|20101228030809.000|CC1|OFFENDERS.                      
20101228030809.000|20101228030813.000|CC1|>> A LOT OF WRITE-UPS,          
20101228030813.000|20101228030815.000|CC1|TATTOOING, THEFT, UNAUTHORIZED  
20101228030815.000|20101228030821.000|CC1|POSSESSION AND ASSAULT.         
20101228030821.000|20101228030822.000|CC1|>> WHY?                         
20101228030822.000|20101228030825.000|CC1|>> TO FIT IN.                   
20101228030825.000|20101228030827.000|CC1|I DON'T KNOW.                   
20101228030827.000|20101228030827.000|CC1|TO EARN RESPECT.                
20101228030827.000|20101228030829.000|CC1|I TOOK SOMEONE'S TV.            
20101228030829.000|20101228030831.000|CC1|HE WAS A PIECE OF [ BLEEP ].    
20101228030831.000|20101228030832.000|CC1|THAT'S CRAZY.                   
20101228030832.000|20101228030832.000|CC1|WHAT'S THAT?                    
20101228030832.000|20101228030841.000|CC1|>> YEAH, I'M CURIOUS TOO.       
20101228030841.000|20101228030844.000|CC1|>> OUR INTERVIEW IS CUT SHORT AS
20101228030844.000|20101228030846.000|CC1|MASSIVE AMOUNTS OF WATER CASCADE
20101228030846.000|20101228030846.000|CC1|INTO THE CELL BLOCK FROM THE    
20101228030846.000|20101228030850.000|CC1|SECOND TIER.                    
20101228030850.000|20101228030851.000|CC1|>> THEY FLOODED THE TIER.       
20101228030851.000|20101228030859.000|CC1|>> THAT'S AWESOME.              
20101228030859.000|20101228030859.000|CC1|>> WHAT HAPPENED?               
20101228030859.000|20101228030901.000|CC1|>> I HAVE NO IDEA.              
20101228030901.000|20101228030903.000|CC1|>> WHAT'S IT LOOK LIKE HAPPENED?
20101228030903.000|20101228030905.000|CC1|>> I'M NOT EVEN GOING TO SAY    
20101228030905.000|20101228030912.000|CC1|NOTHING WITH THAT DOOR OPEN.    
20101228030912.000|20101228030917.000|CC1|>> AS STAFF START TO CLEAN UP   
20101228030917.000|20101228030918.000|CC1|THE CELL BLOCK, WE WOULD SOON   
20101228030918.000|20101228030919.000|CC1|LEARN THAT THE FLOODING HAD TO
